title: Welcome to your Hub application!
brief: This portal provides a beautiful, robust starting point for your next organization application. It is to become your intranet portal. Below are some terminologies to get familiarized and remembered.

topics.icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24"  height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="icon icon-tabler stroke-gray-400 icons-tabler-outline icon-tabler-user"><path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M8 7a4 4 0 1 0 8 0a4 4 0 0 0 -8 0" /><path d="M6 21v-2a4 4 0 0 1 4 -4h4a4 4 0 0 1 4 4v2" /></svg>
topics.title: Staff
topics.brief:
Staff are users who into either of 2 types.
First, persons who are directly into your organization's payroll, commonly called Employees.
Second, persons are contracted to function in your organization and payment for his/her services is done thru a vendor company, we'll call this Vendor Contractor.

topics.title: Careers
topics.brief: Amkor Technology is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

topics.title: Job Role
topics.brief: This is an organizational role associated to a job position to perform its associated responsibility. Can be either a single job position, or a group of position/title having the same responsibility.

topics.icon: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  width="24"  height="24"  viewBox="0 0 24 24"  fill="none"  stroke-width="1.5"  stroke-linecap="round"  stroke-linejoin="round"  class="icon icon-tabler stroke-gray-400 icons-tabler-outline icon-tabler-armchair"><path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"/><path d="M5 11a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v2h10v-2a2 2 0 1 1 4 0v4a2 2 0 0 1 -2 2h-14a2 2 0 0 1 -2 -2v-4a2 2 0 0 1 2 -2z" /><path d="M5 11v-5a3 3 0 0 1 3 -3h8a3 3 0 0 1 3 3v5" /><path d="M6 19v2" /><path d="M18 19v2" /></svg>
topics.title: Task
topics.brief: A usually assigned piece of work often to be finished within a certain time. Tasks are mostly created when processes and workflows gets executed. It is crucial that tasks are assigned accordingly.

topics.title: Manager
topics.brief: Authentication and registration views are included with Laravel Jetstream, as well as support for user email verification and resetting forgotten passwords.

topics.title: Staff
topics.brief:
Staff are users who into either of 2 types.
First, persons who are directly into your organization's payroll, commonly called Employees.
Second, persons are contracted to function in your organization and payment for his/her services is done thru a vendor company, we'll call this Vendor Contractor.
